text.section:
Sec. 30-412. Records of traffic violations; traffic tickets; public records.
The Clerk of the Court of appropriate jurisdiction shall keep a record of all alleged violations of the traffic ordinances of this County of which any person has been charged, together with a record of the final disposition of all such alleged offenses.
All traffic complaints and notices of violations issued by police officers, shall be serially numbered. The records and reports of the clerk are public records.
